extendedInfo.description: â âChallenge yourself in this fun and popular puzzle gameâ âSolve the puzzle and advance to the next floor. Be the one to reach the top floor and tell your friends about it. In this game logical solutions are in focus.This is the next big thing when it comes to Room Escape games!â âFeaturesâ ââ Addictiveâ Well developedâ HD graphicsâ Constant updates of new Floorsâ Use the capabilities of your device to the maximum (tilting, shaking, swiping)!â Lightweightâ Freeâ âHow to playâ âMove objects, tilt, shake, pinch and swipe to find a way to solve the puzzle.Pick up items and use them from your inventory to help you find the solution.â âGot stuck?â âGuide:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cliffdrop.floors2013Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/100Floors2013(Write to us and you will get an answer)Keywords: 100 Gates, 100 Doors, 100 Floors, 100 Crypts, 100 Doors of Revenge, the floor escape, puzzle, brain, IQ, new, fun, addictive.Disclaimer: We are in no way associated with any other creators of 100 Gates or 100 Doors-like escape games..

reviews.title: Where are the other 50 floors???
reviews.comment: Great game but only half the floors.  Floor 51 says more next week. ..but it\'s been several weeks now with no updates....  If you are not going to make 100 floors then change the game\'s name to 50 floors.   I would have given 5 stars if it had been as advertised.
reviews.author: Mel Kiburtz

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Updated .. but still no more new levels :( stuck on level 50....
reviews.author: Mohammad Assaad

reviews.title: Good game but more levels needed :(
reviews.comment: Good!!
reviews.author: Ranjan Sureka

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This is a pretty good game just disappointed, it says releasing 30 new levels after a week, and it\'s been long than a week
reviews.author: Becca Horne

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Its been a year and a half and i still havent got the new levels. I am stuck on level 50. I cannot update because it hasnt come up
reviews.author: Mandy Mcdonald

reviews.title: I like this game!
reviews.comment: I played this game on my friends Ipad. It was fun! I like how it makes you think. I got her from floor 47 to floor 81 :)
reviews.author: Keandrea Mckinnie

reviews.title: OBTRUSIVE ADS!!
reviews.comment: I appreciate the fact that the game is free, so I understand the need for advertisements. However, can you please fix so that ads do not pop up in the middle of solving (especially boss fight levels)?! When this is fixed I will give five stars! Otherwise, I love the game!
reviews.author: Melinda Mendez

reviews.title: Good games...smart
reviews.comment: Keep updated.....
reviews.author: Tulus Andrianto

reviews.title: Developers are Sell outs ! !
reviews.comment: There are many other 100 floor  games so much betThis game USED TO BE GOOD, b 4  all the pop up ads!  The developer\'s are so sneaky! You try to tap the puzzle to solve , & a split second before, a candy crush ads pops up & u accidentally hit the ad & are sent to another page ! ! ! The entire game is plagued with these adds ! You can\'t access the guide unless u share it on  Facebook, or dl  another one of their games. Greedy people ruined the game! NICE JOB DEVELOPERS!
reviews.author: Carrie Ann Matassa

reviews.title: Ugly
reviews.comment: Ugly
reviews.author: Kris B.

reviews.title: Unkept promises
reviews.comment: Wish that the developers would not post promises that they can\'t or won\'t keep. For at least three weeks I\'ve been seeing the message that more levels are coming in a week.
reviews.author: Steve Graves

reviews.title: Levels....
reviews.comment: I just did update and it didnt add the other 5 levels...which is bull to begin with because the game is called 100 floors and u only have 50...add the other half and i will give it a 5 star
reviews.author: chris rittenhouse

reviews.title: New levels?
reviews.comment: Updated but there r no new levels. Level 51 still says more levels will b coming!

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: I like this app but it only has half the levels it\'s suppose to have. If it only has has 50 levels than call it 50 floors.
